question.title: Will the US government end its agreement directly allowing Verisign to manage the authoritative domain name registry for the .com TLD, before August 3, 2024?

question.title: Will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will Iran not carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Iran will execute a lethal assault on Israeli territory prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if, after the date this question is released and before May 1, 2024, reliable sources report that an attack linked to Iran has taken place within the borders of Israel, resulting in the deaths of no fewer than five people.

question.title: Will Deadpool & Wolverine have biggest opening weekend ever for R-rated movie? [ahead of Deadpool I & II, It, Joker]
question.body:
Analysts are projecting a huge opening weekend for "Deadpool x Wolverine" crossover movie.
https://deepnewz.com/movies/deadpool-wolverine-set-record-360m-global-opening-weekend-biggest-r-rated-debut

"""

The film, directed by Shawn Levy and starring Ryan Reynolds, is projected to earn between $340 million and $360 million globally in its opening weekend. This would mark the biggest opening weekend ever for an R-rated movie. Domestically, the film is expected to debut with $160 million to $170 million, making it the biggest R-rated opening of all-time.

"""

[image]The record for biggest opening weekend for an R-rated movie is the original Deadpool at $284.5M ($152.2M domestic).

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/box-office-deadpool-makes-history-865143/

[image]
Will the new movie top these marks? It will probably be close...

It will certainly play at more theaters... Deadpool was a smash hit at the time, and a bit surprising.

Since BoxOfficeMojo is a bit weird on reporting international opening weekends -- it provides the raw numbers but aggregates them weirdly -- we will wait for Hollywood Reporter to let us know what the weekend opening was.

To clarify on resolution...
-> this market will resolve YES if Deadpool x Wolverine grosses more than $284.5M globally this opening weekend according to reports
-> AND the Hollywood Reporter (or equivalent publication) reports it as the record for an R-rated movie release

In other words the BoxOfficeMojo numbers should be seen as unofficial until there's confirmation in the Hollywood press. And the number we shoot for is >$284.5M internationally... this weekend

https://www.hollywoodreporter.com/movies/movie-news/box-office-deadpool-makes-history-865143/

[image]
Will this new release surpass those figures? It’s likely to be very close...

It will definitely be shown in more theaters... Deadpool was an enormous success at its release, and somewhat unexpected.

Since BoxOfficeMojo has a peculiar way of reporting international opening weekends -- it lists the raw figures but aggregates them strangely -- we will wait for the Hollywood Reporter to provide confirmation of the weekend's earnings.

To clarify on resolution...
-> this market will resolve YES if the Deadpool x Wolverine film earns a substantial amount globally this opening weekend as per reports.

In other words, the BoxOfficeMojo figures should be considered unofficial until there’s validation in the Hollywood media.

question.title: [Metaculus] Will the domestic box office opening of "Deadpool & Wolverine" be higher than th..."The Wolverine" combined?
question.body:

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25850/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

question.title: [Metaculus] Will the US government end its agreement directly allowing Verisign to manage th...D, before August 3, 2024?
question.body:
Will the US government end its agreement directly allowing Verisign to manage the authoritative domain name registry for the .com TLD, before August 3, 2024?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/25791/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question resolves as Yes if before August 3, 2024, the US Department of Commerce (DOC) officially terminates or sunsets its Cooperative Agreement with Verisign recognizing Verisign's management of the .com generic top-level domain (TLD). If this does not happen, this question resolves as No.

question.title: Will diplomatic expulsions or recalls take place between the Philippines and China before August 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if before August 1, 2024, one of these four events happens, according to official statements or [credible reports](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions): 

- The Philippines expels at least one diplomat representing the People's Republic of China (PRC). 

- The Philippines recalls at least one of its diplomats stationed in the PRC.

- The PRC expels at least one diplomat representing the Philippines.

- The PRC recalls at least one of its diplomats stationed in the Philippines. 

If there are no such reports before that date, then this resolves as **No**.

- The Philippines does not recall any of its diplomats stationed in the PRC.

- The PRC does not expel any diplomat representing the Philippines.

- The PRC does not recall any of its diplomats stationed in the Philippines.

question.title: Will OpenAI's ChatGPT be generally available in the European Union on June 30, 2024?
question.body:
The question resolves as **YES** if [ChatGPT](chat.openai.com) is generally available in the EU on June 30, 2024, and **NO** otherwise.

"Generally available" here means that the default state for people in the EU is that they can access it without a VPN (possibly requiring paying for it.) If unavailable in certain EU countries (as was the case in Italy in early 2023), or unavailable to (for example) minors, this will still resolve positively, assuming at least >50% of the population can use it.

"ChatGPT" here refers to the general web interface (not the API) for interacting with GPT models. Still resolves positively if the name or website has changed, as long as OpenAI's service is substantially the same (entering queries to systems based on Large Language Models).

question.title: Will "Twisters" (2024) have a Rotten Tomatoes critics score of at least 75%? ("Certified Fresh")
question.body:
"Twisters" (2024) Rotten Tomatoes page

This resolves YES if the Tomatometer score is 75% or higher, one week after release (July 26th). 

Details 

I will use whatever precision is listed by Rotten Tomatoes (typically an integer percentage, no decimal).

For example, the original "Twister" (1996) currently has a Tomatometer of 63%. This is the equivalent score I will use.

"Certified Fresh" is just used for illustrative purposes (AFAIK, it requires >=75% Tomatometer, but there might be other restrictions—the market resolves solely based on the displayed score).

"Twisters" (2024) is a standalone sequel to the 1996 original, directed by Lee Isaac Chung ("Minari"), starring Glen Powell ("Top Gun: Maverick") and Daisy Edgar Jones ("Normal People").

question.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

not_P.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be less than or equal to 3 or greater than 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden exceed 3 but not surpass 4 based on 538's average of national polls?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be determined by the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden as indicated by 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as shown in the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this context, a positive figure signifies a lead for Trump, whereas a negative figure indicates that Biden is in front. For instance, on July 5, 2024, the reported value shows Trump leading Biden by 2.4 points, which would be interpreted as a positive value of 2.4 for the purposes of this question.

question.title: Will Russian athletes be barred from competing at the 2024 Olympics?
question.body:
This question will resolve as **Yes** if Russian athletes are barred from competing at the 2024 Olympics under either (i) the Russian flag, (ii) The Russian Olympic Committee's flag, or (iii) any other independent or neutral flag. This will resolve based on the official list of countries and athletes present at the [2024 Olympics](https://olympics.com/en/olympic-games/paris-2024) or based on credible media reports, indicating that the 2024 Olympics are underway or have concluded without Russian participation. For the question to resolve as **Yes**, no more than 34 Russians can be competing at the 2024 Olympics. 34 was chosen as 10% of [Russian athletes that participated in the 2020 Olympics](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_Olympic_Committee_athletes_at_the_2020_Summer_Olympics) to allow for a few individual or sport specific exceptions.

If more than 34 Russian athletes compete at the 2024 Olympics, this question will resolve as **No**.

If the 2024 Olympics are cancelled or postponed to 2025 or afterwards, this question resolves as ambiguously.

If 34 or fewer Russian athletes compete at the 2024 Olympics, this question will resolve as **No**.

If the 2024 Olympics are cancelled or postponed to 2025 or afterwards, this question resolves as ambiguously.

This figure was selected as it represents 10% of the [Russian athletes who participated in the 2020 Olympics](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Russian_Olympic_Committee_athletes_at_the_2020_Summer_Olympics), allowing for a few exceptions for individual athletes or specific sports.

question.title: Will the Venezuelan electoral commission publish full results of the July 28 presidential election before August 12, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves as Yes if [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that, before Monday, August 12, 2024 at 12:01 AM Venezuelan Standard Time (VET), any entity of the Venezuelan government has published results of the July 28, 2024 election purporting to represent 100% of the votes cast, disaggregated to the level of parish (*parroquia*, a subdivision of municipalities).

not_P.title: Will the Venezuelan electoral commission not publish full results of the July 28 presidential election before August 12, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as Yes if [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that, before Monday, August 12, 2024 at 12:01 AM Venezuelan Standard Time (VET), no entity of the Venezuelan government has published results of the July 28, 2024 election purporting to represent 100% of the votes cast, disaggregated to the level of parish (*parroquia*, a subdivision of municipalities).

para_P.title: Will the complete results of the presidential election held on July 28, 2024, be released by the Venezuelan electoral authority prior to August 12, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered affirmatively if [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) indicate that, before Monday, August 12, 2024 at 12:01 AM Venezuelan Standard Time (VET), any Venezuelan government body has disclosed results of the July 28, 2024 election that claim to represent all votes cast, broken down to the parish level (*parroquia*, a subdivision of municipalities).

not_P.title: Will the Venezuelan electoral commission not publish full results of the July 28 presidential election before August 12, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves as Yes if [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that, before Monday, August 12, 2024 at 12:01 AM Venezuelan Standard Time (VET), no entity of the Venezuelan government has published results of the July 28, 2024 election purporting to represent 100% of the votes cast, disaggregated to the level of parish (*parroquia*, a subdivision of municipalities).

question.title: Will the domestic box office opening of "Deadpool & Wolverine" be higher than that of "Deadpool" and "The Wolverine" combined?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if the domestic box office opening for the **Deadpool & Wolverine** reported by Boxofficemojo on the [movie's page](https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt6263850/?ref_=bo_se_r_1) is higher than $185,548,391 which is the sum of the box openings for **Deadpool** (2016) and **The Wolverine** (2013): $132,434,639 + $53,113,752.

question.title: Will OpenAI publicly commit to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle before July 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if, before July 1, 2024, both of the following are true:

- OpenAI publicly commits to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle via a statement from the company or a company spokesperson, such as Sam Altman. The statement may be formal (such as a press release) or informal (such as a tweet or quote in an interview). The statement from OpenAI must indicate a new level of commitment to the principle in question, relative to the time the righttowarn.ai statement was published; it cannot be a reiteration that, for example, "we already have a culture of open criticism". 
- Metaculus verifies that the company has accepted the principle to the satisfaction of at least one member of righttowarn.ai. Metaculus may reach out to select signatories or endorsers to assess their level of satisfaction with OpenAI's commitment. Statements must be at least as rigorous as "this was a good first step" for this question to resolve as **Yes**.

question.title: Will the same nation win more than one women's team sport at the 2024 Olympics?
question.body:
This question resolves as **No** if women's teams representing eight different National Olympic Committees (NOC) win gold in these eight team sports at the 2024 Paris Olympics: 

- association football 
- 3×3 basketball
- 5×5 basketball
- field hockey
- handball 
- rugby sevens
- volleyball
- water polo.

Otherwise, the same NOC must have won at least two of these events, so the question resolves as **Yes**.

The question can resolve as soon as it becomes clear one of these conditions will happen (e.g. neither team playing the final of the last event has won any of the others).

not_P.title: Will Iran not carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Iran will execute a lethal strike inside Israel prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered resolved as **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, reliable sources confirm that an assault linked to Iran, taking place within the territory of Israel, has resulted in the fatalities of no fewer than five people.

not_P.title: Will Iran not carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will Iran carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports indicating that an attack attributed to Iran and occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Is it possible that Iran will refrain from executing a lethal assault inside Israel prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will resolve to **Yes** if, after the date this question is made public and before May 1, 2024, there are no trustworthy reports suggesting that an attack linked to Iran, taking place within the territory of Israel, has resulted in the deaths of at least five people.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, reliable information suggests that an attack linked to Iran, taking place within the territory of Israel, has resulted in the fatalities of at least five people.

not_P.title: Is there no possibility that Iran will execute a lethal assault inside Israel prior to May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if, after the publication date of this question and before May 1, 2024, reliable information suggests that an attack linked to Iran, taking place within the territory of Israel, has not resulted in the fatalities of at least five people.

para_P.title: Could Iran potentially carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This question will be answered with **Yes** if, following the release date of this inquiry and before May 1, 2024, credible evidence indicates that an assault associated with Iran, occurring in Israel, has led to the deaths of no fewer than five individuals.

question.title: Will any entity carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
question.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, credible reports indicate that an attack occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will no entity carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if, after the date of this question's release and before May 1, 2024, reliable information suggests that an assault taking place within Israel's territory has resulted in the deaths of no fewer than five people.

not_P.title: Will no entity carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are no credible reports indicating that an attack occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

not_P.title: Will some entity carry out a deadly attack within Israel before May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This question resolves **Yes** if, following the date of this question's publication and before May 1, 2024, there are credible reports indicating that an attack occurring within Israel's borders has led to the death of at least five individuals.

para_P.title: Is it true that no organization will execute a lethal assault in Israel prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will resolve to **Yes** if, after the date this question is published and before May 1, 2024, there are no reliable accounts suggesting that an assault within the borders of Israel has resulted in the deaths of five or more people.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that an organization will execute a lethal assault in Israel prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be marked as **Yes** if, after the date this question is posed and before May 1, 2024, reliable information suggests that an assault within the territory of Israel has resulted in the fatalities of at least five people.

not_P.title: Is there no possibility that an organization will execute a lethal assault in Israel prior to May 1, 2024?
not_P.body: This inquiry will be marked as **Yes** if, after the date this question is posed and before May 1, 2024, there is no reliable information suggesting that an assault within the territory of Israel has resulted in the fatalities of at least five people.

para_P.title: Could an organization carry out a deadly attack in Israel before May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This question will receive a **Yes** designation if, following the date this inquiry is made and prior to May 1, 2024, credible evidence indicates that an attack in Israel has led to the deaths of no fewer than five individuals.

question.title: Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate?
question.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is another presidential debate for the Democratic party expected?
para_P.body: Determines YES if a debate occurs among prospective Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Determines NO in all other cases.

not_P.title: Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there be a Democratic party presidential debate?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is it true that there will be no presidential debate among Democratic party candidates?
para_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate occurring among prospective Democratic nominees (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO in all other cases.

para_P.title: Is another presidential debate for the Democratic party expected?
para_P.body: Resolves YES if a debate occurs among possible Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO in all other cases.

not_P.title: Is another presidential debate for the Democratic party not expected?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if no debate occurs among possible Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 Democratic National Convention. Resolves NO in all other cases.

para_P.title: Can we anticipate another presidential debate for the Democratic party?
para_P.body: This will be resolved as YES if there is a debate held among potential Democratic candidates (including Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 Democratic National Convention. It will be resolved as NO in all other scenarios.

question.title: Will there be another Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 presidential election?
question.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 presidential election. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 presidential election?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 presidential election. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is it possible that another presidential debate for the Democratic party will take place before the 2024 election?
para_P.body: Resolves YES if a debate occurs among prospective Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) prior to the 2024 presidential election. Resolves NO in all other scenarios.

not_P.title: Will there be no Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 presidential election?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is no debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 presidential election. Resolves NO otherwise.

not_P.title: Will there be a Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 presidential election?
not_P.body: Resolves YES if there is a debate between potential Democratic nominees (e.g. Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden etc.) prior to the 2024 presidential election. Resolves NO otherwise.

para_P.title: Is it true that there will not be a Democratic party presidential debate before the 2024 election?
para_P.body: Resolves YES if a debate does not occur among possible Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 presidential election. Resolves NO in any other case.

para_P.title: Is it possible that another presidential debate for the Democratic party will occur before the 2024 election?
para_P.body: Determines YES if a debate takes place among possible Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 presidential election. Determines NO in all other cases.

not_P.title: Is it not possible that another presidential debate for the Democratic party will occur before the 2024 election?
not_P.body: Determines YES if no debate takes place among possible Democratic candidates (such as Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 presidential election. Determines NO in all other cases.

para_P.title: Could there be an additional presidential debate for the Democratic party prior to the 2024 election?
para_P.body: Determines YES if a debate occurs involving potential Democratic contenders (including Harris, Newsom, Whitmer, Biden, etc.) before the 2024 presidential election. Determines NO in all other scenarios.

question.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 2 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

not_P.body:

para_P.body:

question.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 2 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

not_P.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be 2 or less on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden exceed 2 according to 538's national polling average?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be determined by the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as displayed on the chart for July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this context, a positive figure indicates a lead for Trump, while a negative figure signifies a lead for Biden. For instance, on July 5, 2024, the reported value shows Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which translates to a positive value of 2.4 for the purposes of this question.

not_P.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be 2 or less on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

not_P.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 2 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will the national polling average from 538 show that Trump is ahead of Biden by 2 points or fewer?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be determined by the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as displayed on the chart for July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this context, a positive figure indicates a lead for Trump, whereas a negative figure signifies that Biden is in front. For instance, on July 5, 2024, the reported figure shows Trump leading Biden by 2.4 points, which translates to a positive value of 2.4 for the purposes of this inquiry.

para_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will the difference in polling between Trump and Biden exceed 2 according to 538's national average?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be determined by the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as indicated on the chart for July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this context, a positive figure signifies a lead for Trump, whereas a negative figure indicates Biden is ahead. For instance, on July 5, 2024, the reported value shows Trump leading Biden by 2.4 points, which would be interpreted as a positive value of 2.4 for the purposes of this question.

not_P.title: On July 15, 2024, will the difference in polling between Trump and Biden not exceed 2 according to 538's national average?
not_P.body:
This inquiry will be determined by the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as indicated on the chart for July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this context, a positive figure signifies a lead for Trump, whereas a negative figure indicates Biden is ahead. For instance, on July 5, 2024, the reported value shows Trump leading Biden by 2.4 points, which would be interpreted as a positive value of 2.4 for the purposes of this question.

para_P.title: Will the polling gap between Trump and Biden surpass 2 on July 15, 2024, based on 538's national average?
para_P.body:
This question will be answered by examining how much Donald Trump is ahead of Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as shown on the chart dated July 15, 2024, which will be assessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

In this scenario, a positive number indicates a lead for Trump, while a negative number suggests Biden is in front. For example, on July 5, 2024, the reported figure indicates Trump is leading Biden by 2.4 points, which would be regarded as a positive value of 2.4 in relation to this inquiry.

question.title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office

not_P.title: Will Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and do not cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to not invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.title: Will Biden be recognized as incapacitated according to Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August?
para_P.body:
This question will be answered with YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or other appropriate authority) activates Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his position" and allows the Vice President to assume the role of Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is not relevant to this inquiry.

Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, or similar circumstances does not apply. Biden's invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also not considered.

not_P.title: Will Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and do not cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker does not ask Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

not_P.title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.title: Will Biden remain unrecognized as incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August?
para_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President alongside a majority of the Cabinet (or other pertinent entity) does not utilize Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and does not lead to the Vice President acting as President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant for this inquiry.

Biden leaving the Presidential office due to death, resignation, etc., is not included. Biden's application of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is not considered.

para_P.title: Will Biden be deemed unfit under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August?
para_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate authority) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to perform the powers and responsibilities of his position" and enable the Vice President to act as President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant to this inquiry.

Biden leaving the presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not included. Biden's invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also excluded.

Context: A GOP lawmaker requests Merrick Garland to use the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from the presidency.

not_P.title: Will Biden not be deemed unfit under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment prior to August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate authority) does not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to perform the powers and responsibilities of his position" and does not enable the Vice President to act as President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant to this inquiry.

Biden leaving the presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not included. Biden's invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also excluded.

Context: A GOP lawmaker does not request Merrick Garland to use the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from the presidency.

para_P.title: Could Biden be considered unfit according to Section 4 of the 25th Amendment before August?
para_P.body:
This resolves to YES if the Vice President, along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another suitable authority), activates Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and duties of his office" and allows the Vice President to assume the role of President, prior to August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not factor into this question.

The scenario of Biden leaving the presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not part of this consideration. Biden's use of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also not included.

Context: A Republican lawmaker has urged Merrick Garland to utilize the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant for this inquiry.

Biden leaving the presidency due to death, resignation, etc., is not considered. Biden's invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment does not count.

Context: A GOP legislator requests Merrick Garland to implement the 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.body:
Determines YES if the Vice President, along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another pertinent authority), invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to execute the powers and duties of his office" and permits the Vice President to assume the position of Acting President, prior to September 2024 (Eastern time).

question.title: At the 2024 Olympics, will at least 5 countries win their debut gold medal?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if 5 or more countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

not_P.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if fewer than 5 countries win their first-ever Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, according to [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if 5 or more nations achieve their inaugural Olympic gold medal at the Paris Olympics, based on [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions).

question.title: If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet cover the story at least 6 hours in advance?
question.body:
Question resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post covers the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc.

Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient.

This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

not_P.title: If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet not cover the story at least 6 hours in advance?
not_P.body:
Question resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post does not cover the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc.

Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will still not be sufficient.

This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

para_P.title: Should Joe Biden decide to withdraw, will a credible news source report the event at least 6 hours prior?
para_P.body:
This question will be considered YES if a major and trustworthy news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden makes his official announcement of withdrawal through a letter, speech, etc.

Coverage by local news, conspiracy websites, or individual comments on Manifold will not be adequate.

This market will be deemed N/A if President Joe Biden does not withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

not_P.title: If Joe Biden drops out, will a reliable media outlet not cover the story at least 6 hours in advance?
not_P.body:
Question resolves YES if a big and reliable media outlet like Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post does not cover the dropout with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially announces his dropout via letter, speech, etc.

Local news, conspiracy websites, or comments by individual users on Manifold will be sufficient.

This market will be resolved as N/A if President Joe Biden does not drop out before the end of the National Democratic Convention.

para_P.title: Should Joe Biden decide to withdraw, will a credible news organization refrain from reporting the event at least 6 hours beforehand?
para_P.body:
This question will be considered TRUE if a major and trustworthy news source such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post does not report the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours prior to President Joe Biden's formal announcement of his withdrawal through a letter, speech, etc.

Reports from local news, conspiracy websites, or comments made by individual users on Manifold will not be adequate.

This market will be marked as N/A if President Joe Biden does not withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

para_P.title: In the event that Joe Biden withdraws, will a credible news source report the incident no less than 6 hours prior?
para_P.body:
This question will be considered TRUE if a major and trustworthy news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden makes his official announcement regarding his withdrawal through a letter, speech, etc.

Coverage by local news, conspiracy theory websites, or statements from individual users on Manifold will not be adequate.

This market will be deemed N/A if President Joe Biden does not withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

not_P.title: In the event that Joe Biden withdraws, will no credible news source report the incident no less than 6 hours prior?
not_P.body:
This question will be considered TRUE if no major and trustworthy news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden makes his official announcement regarding his withdrawal through a letter, speech, etc.

Coverage by local news, conspiracy theory websites, or statements from individual users on Manifold will not be adequate.

This market will be deemed N/A if President Joe Biden does not withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

para_P.title: If Joe Biden decides to step down, will a reputable news outlet announce the event at least 6 hours in advance?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be regarded as TRUE if a significant and reliable news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation no less than 6 hours before President Joe Biden officially declares his withdrawal through a letter, speech, etc.

Reports from local news, conspiracy theory websites, or comments from individual users on Manifold will not be sufficient.

This market will be considered N/A if President Joe Biden does not step down prior to the end of the National Democratic Convention.

para_P.body:
This question will be considered YES if a major and trustworthy news organization such as Associated Press News, CNN, New York Times, Wall Street Journal, Fox News, Reuters, or Washington Post reports the withdrawal with an unofficial confirmation at least 6 hours before President Joe Biden makes his official announcement of withdrawal through a letter, speech, etc.

Coverage by local news, conspiracy websites, or comments from individual users on Manifold will not be adequate.

This market will be marked as N/A if President Joe Biden does not withdraw before the conclusion of the National Democratic Convention.

question.title: Iran military response before August 13th midnight Eastern Time?
question.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Iran initiates a military action on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory between July 30 and August 12, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Israeli soil is hit by an Iranian missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory will count toward the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces (i.e. Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not count toward the resolution of this market.

not_P.title: Iran military response not before August 13th midnight Eastern Time?
not_P.body:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Iran does not initiate a military action on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory between July 30 and August 12, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Israeli soil is hit by an Iranian missile, this market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

Only responses by Iranian forces explicitly claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory will count toward the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy forces (i.e. Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not count toward the resolution of this market.

para_P.title: Will Iran take military action before midnight Eastern Time on August 13th?
para_P.body:
This market will settle on "Yes" if Iran conducts a military operation within Israeli territory, airspace, or maritime zones from July 30 to August 12, 2024, at 11:59 PM ET. If no such action occurs, the market will settle on "No".

For this market, a "military operation" refers to any forceful action taken by Iran on Israeli land, in its airspace, or within its maritime boundaries (for instance, if an Iranian missile strikes a weapons depot located in Israel, the market will settle on "Yes") that is officially recognized by the Iranian government or confirmed by a consensus of reliable reports. This encompasses, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval assaults, or ground invasions. Cyber warfare, sanctions, or diplomatic measures will not be considered for the resolution of this market.

Only actions taken by Iranian military forces that are either claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran or verified to have originated from Iranian soil will be counted for this market's resolution. Attacks on Israel carried out by proxy groups (such as Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not be counted towards the resolution of this market.

not_P.body:

For the purposes of this market, a "military action" will be considered to be any use of force executed by Iran on Israeli soil, airspace, or maritime territory (e.g. if a weapons depot on Israeli soil is hit by an Iranian missile, this market will resolve to "No") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or a consensus of credible reporting. This includes, but is not limited to, airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. Cyber attacks, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not count towards the resolution of this market.

para_P.title: Will there be a military action from Iran before midnight Eastern Time on August 13th?
para_P.body:
This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Iran refrains from launching any military operations on Israeli territory, airspace, or maritime areas between July 30 and August 12, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If any military action occurs, the market will determine a "No".

For this market's purposes, "military action" encompasses any forceful engagement by Iran on Israeli land, air, or sea (for instance, if an Iranian missile strikes an Israeli weapons depot, the market will resolve to "No") that is officially recognized by the Iranian government or supported by credible reports. This includes, but is not limited to, aerial bombardments, naval strikes, or land invasions. Cyber warfare, economic sanctions, or diplomatic measures will not influence the outcome of this market.

Only actions by Iranian military forces that are officially claimed by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian territory, will be considered for this market's resolution. Attacks on Israel carried out by proxy groups (such as Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not affect the resolution of this market.

para_P.title: Will Iran engage in military action prior to midnight Eastern Time on August 13th?
para_P.body:
This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Iran conducts a military operation on Israeli land, in its airspace, or within its maritime boundaries from July 30 until August 12, 2024, at 11:59 PM ET. If no such action occurs, the market will result in a "No".

For the context of this market, a "military operation" refers to any act of force carried out by Iran on Israeli land, in its airspace, or within its maritime boundaries (for instance, if an Iranian missile strikes a weapons depot located in Israel, the market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially recognized by the Iranian government or corroborated by a consensus of reliable reports. This encompasses various forms of military engagement, including airstrikes, naval assaults, or ground invasions. However, cyber operations, sanctions, or diplomatic measures will not be considered in the resolution of this market.

Only actions taken by Iranian military forces that are explicitly acknowledged by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have been launched from Iranian territory, will be counted for the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy groups (such as Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not be included in the resolution of this market.

For the context of this market, a "military operation" refers to any act of force that is not carried out by Iran on Israeli land, in its airspace, or within its maritime boundaries (for instance, if an Iranian missile does not strike a weapons depot located in Israel, the market will resolve to "No") that is not officially recognized by the Iranian government or corroborated by a consensus of reliable reports. Attacks on Israel by proxy groups (such as Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will still not be included in the resolution of this market.

para_P.title: Will Iran take military action before midnight Eastern Time on August 13th?
para_P.body:
This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Iran executes a military operation on Israeli territory, in its airspace, or within its maritime limits from July 30 until August 12, 2024, at 11:59 PM ET. If no such action takes place, the market will yield a "No".

For the purposes of this market, a "military operation" is defined as any use of force performed by Iran on Israeli territory, in its airspace, or within its maritime boundaries (for example, if an Iranian missile impacts a weapons depot situated in Israel, the market will resolve to "Yes") that is officially acknowledged by the Iranian government or supported by a consensus of credible reports. This includes various types of military engagement, such as airstrikes, naval attacks, or ground invasions. However, cyber operations, sanctions, or diplomatic actions will not be factored into the resolution of this market.

Only actions executed by Iranian military forces that are explicitly recognized by the Islamic Republic of Iran, or confirmed to have originated from Iranian soil, will be considered for the resolution of this market. Attacks on Israel by proxy groups (such as Hezbollah, Houthis, etc.) will not be counted in the resolution of this market.

para_P.body: This inquiry will be answered with **Yes** if any tennis player earns at least one medal at the 2024 Paris Olympic Games. It will be answered with NO in all other cases.

para_P.body: This question will receive a response of **Yes** if any tennis athlete wins at least one medal at the 2024 Paris Olympic Games. It will be answered with NO in all other circumstances.

question.title: Will Joe Biden still be president by the end of July?
question.body: This market will resolve yes if at 11:59 pm on July 31st 2024 if Joe Biden is still officially president of the United States.

not_P.body: This market will resolve yes if at 11:59 pm on July 31st 2024 Joe Biden is not officially president of the United States.

question.title: Will Israel expand its ground invasion to the city of Rafah before June 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question will resolve **Yes** if the [Institute for the Study of War](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/2e746151991643e39e64780f0674f7dd) (ISW) reports Israeli military operations on its map at any of six locations surrounding Rafah (the specific locations are shown in the map embedded below) before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will at least 30% of Manifold respondents agree that weak AGI had been achieved before July 23, 2024?
question.body:
[image]Every month, a Manifold poll is being posted to gain the consensus view of progress towards AGI. Unlike many of the markets and questions on Manifold, these polls will simply ask "has weak AGI been achieved," rather than providing a definition of the term. The goal is that given that the term is so broad, the only way to characterize AI progress is also to allow respondents to vote based upon their own understanding.

Progress has been steady.  The previous polls are referenced here:

@/SteveSokolowski/did-openai-achieve-weak-agi-with-gp  (Answer: 15)

@/SteveSokolowski/june-2024-has-weak-agi-been-achieve  (Answer: 27)

The previous markets on this topic, which significantly understimated Manifold's belief in AI progress, were:

@/SteveSokolowski/what-percentage-of-manifold-poll-re 

@/SteveSokolowski/will-at-least-20-of-manifold-respon 

The polls will not reference any specific model, and will not define "AGI" except to state that the poll does not require that the software system be able to manipulate the physical world. The polls open on the 23rd of each month and close on the 30th.

This market will resolve to YES if the July 2024 poll results in a ratio of YES/(NO + YES) greater than or equal to 0.3. The "no opinion" respondents will be ignored. Otherwise, this question will resolve to NO.

See also:

@/SteveSokolowski/will-one-of-the-monthly-has-weak-ag

question.title: Facing Joe Biden instead of a generic Democrat, will Trump gain at least 3% among Manifold respondents?
question.body:
There are two Manifold polls posted, which both close on July 6.  One of the polls asks Manifold respondents to vote with Joe Biden on a hypothetical ballot, and another asks respondents to vote with a generic Democrat on the hypothetical ballot.

@/SteveSokolowski/1-of-2-given-these-choices-who-woul@/SteveSokolowski/2-of-2-given-these-choices-who-woul 

Public opinion polls consistently show Joe Biden losing to Donald Trump outside the margin of error, but every other Democrat hypothetically surveyed polls ahead or within the margin of error.  Are Manifold respondents representative of the general public?

This market will resolve YES if the percentage of votes for Donald Trump in poll 1 exceeds that in poll 2 by 3% or more when both polls close.

The formula for determining the percentage of votes for Trump is (Trump / (Trump + (the Democrat in the question) + Someone else)).  The answer is YES if this formula for poll 1 - the formula for poll 2 >= 0.03.  Otherwise, it is NO.

The polls and this question will never resolve N/A, and will remain open until the close time no matter what.

para_P.title: If Donald Trump faces Joe Biden rather than a standard Democrat, will he receive at least a 3% increase in support from Manifold poll respondents?
para_P.body:
Two Manifold polls are available, both closing on July 6. One poll asks Manifold participants to choose Joe Biden on a hypothetical ballot, while the other asks them to select a generic Democrat on a similar ballot.

Public sentiment surveys frequently indicate that Joe Biden is trailing Donald Trump beyond the margin of error, whereas every other Democrat surveyed in these hypothetical scenarios is either leading or tied within the margin of error. Are the Manifold participants indicative of the broader public opinion?

This market will confirm YES if Donald Trump's vote percentage in the first poll surpasses that in the second poll by 3% or more when both polls conclude.

To calculate Trump's vote percentage, use the formula (Trump / (Trump + (the Democrat in question) + Someone else)). A YES answer is given if the result of the formula for poll 1 minus the formula for poll 2 is greater than or equal to 0.03. If not, the answer is NO.

The polls and this inquiry will not resolve as N/A and will stay open until the specified closing time, regardless of circumstances.

question.title: Between July 17 and July 28, 2024, will the strongest geomagnetic storm have a K-index ("Kp") greater than 5 and less than or equal to 6?
question.body: This question resolves Yes if the highest Planetary K-index ("Kp") between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is greater than 5 and less than or equal to 6, according to the German Research Center for Geosciences in their running 30-day history data product.

not_P.title: Between July 17 and July 28, 2024, will the strongest geomagnetic storm have a K-index ("Kp") less than or equal to 5 or greater than 6?
not_P.body: This question resolves Yes if the highest Planetary K-index ("Kp") between July 17 and July 28, 2024 (inclusive) is not greater than 5 or not less than or equal to 6, according to the German Research Center for Geosciences in their running 30-day history data product.

para_P.title: During the period from July 17 to July 28, 2024, will there be a peak geomagnetic storm with a K-index ("Kp") exceeding 5 and at most 6?

question.title: Will at least 50 Kenyan military or police personnel arrive in Haiti before June 1, 2024?

question.title: Will M. Night Shyamalan's "Trap" (2024) gross >$20 million during its (domestic) opening weekend?
question.body:
Source: The "Domestic Opening" number listed on BoxOfficeMojo for "Trap" (2024).

I will use the "Domestic Opening" listed on BoxOfficeMojo, however it is defined (e.g. typically the 3-day FSS weekend + previews). 

For example, the "Domestic Opening" for the M. Night Shyamalan's "Old" was $$16,854,735. This is the equivalent number I will use.

(https://www.youtube.com/embed/hJiPAJKjUVg)

question.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 3 and less than or equal to 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

For the purposes of this question, a positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading. For example, as of July 5, 2024, the value reported for July 5 is Trump 2.4 points ahead of Biden, which would be a positive value of 2.4 for this purposes of this question.

not_P.title: Will Trump's lead over Biden be less than or equal to 3 or greater than 4 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
not_P.body:
This question will resolve as Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

This inquiry will be determined by the extent of Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden in 538's [national polling average for the 2024 presidential election](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/2024/national/) as displayed on the chart for July 15, 2024, when reviewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024.

not_P.body: This question will be considered **Yes** if no nations secure their inaugural Olympic gold medal during the Paris Olympics, based on [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions). It will be deemed NO in all other cases.

para_P.title: Are at least 3 countries expected to win their first gold medal at the 2024 Olympics?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be marked as **Yes** if 3 or more countries obtain their first Olympic gold medal during the Paris Games, according to [trustworthy sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions). It will be classified as NO in all other scenarios.

question.title: Will Joe Biden have an in-person interview/conversation on camera for 45+ minutes, before the end of July 2024?
question.body:
The most recent qualifying interview was Biden's appearance on The Howard Stern Show in April, when Biden answered questions for ~70 minutes. 

If Biden appears in another such in-person interview for at least 45 minutes, this market resolves YES. If no qualifying interview is released before market close at the end of July, this market resolves NO. 

This market does not include press conferences, speeches, rallies, fundraisers, town halls, etc. It can include appearances on a podcast or late night show, or an interview edited into a show like 60 minutes. However, there must be at least 45 minutes of new footage of Biden being interviewed in-person for such appearances to count. A 50 minute video might only feature 20 minutes of video of Biden being interviewed, and so would not count.

For context, Biden's interview with Stephanopoulos in July, his appearance on Jimmy Fallon in February, and his past appearances on 60 minutes have each had less than 30 minutes of video footage of Biden being interviewed. 

You can find a list of Biden's interviews and their transcripts here.

The latest qualifying interview occurred when Biden was on The Howard Stern Show in April, where he responded to questions for approximately 70 minutes. 

If Biden participates in another such face-to-face interview for a minimum of 30 minutes, this market will resolve as YES. Conversely, if no qualifying interview is published before the market closes at the end of July, it will resolve as NO. 

This market excludes press conferences, speeches, rallies, fundraisers, town halls, etc. It may include guest appearances on podcasts or late-night shows, or interviews that are edited into programs like 60 Minutes. However, there must be at least 30 minutes of new footage featuring Biden being interviewed in-person for these appearances to be counted. For instance, a 50-minute video might only showcase 20 minutes of Biden being interviewed, which would not be sufficient. 

For reference, Biden's interview with Stephanopoulos in July, his appearance on Jimmy Fallon in February, and his prior appearances on 60 Minutes have all contained less than 30 minutes of footage of Biden being interviewed. 

A list of Biden's interviews and their transcripts can be found here.

However, there must be at least 30 minutes of new footage of Biden being interviewed in-person for such appearances to count. A 50 minute video might only feature 20 minutes of video of Biden being interviewed, and so would not count.

You can find a list of Biden's interviews and their transcripts here.

question.title: Will the Olympic record for the men's pole vault be broken at the 2024 Paris Olympics?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if at the 2024 Paris Olympics, any men's pole vault athlete clears the bar at 6.04m or higher, according to results posted by the [International Olympic Committee](https://olympics.com/en/olympic-games/olympic-results) or credible sources. If this does not happen, this question resolves as **No**.

If this does happen, this question resolves as **No**.

question.title: Will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invokes Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office

not_P.title: Will Biden not be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and do not cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

Context: GOP lawmaker asks Merrick Garland not to invoke 25th Amendment to remove Biden from office.

para_P.title: Will the 25th Amendment Section 4 be invoked to declare Biden incapacitated prior to August?
para_P.body:
This question will be answered with YES if the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate body) activates Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his position" and enable the Vice President to act as President before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The length of the incapacity is irrelevant to this inquiry.

Biden leaving the presidency through death, resignation, or similar events does not apply. Biden's own invocation of Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is also excluded.

Context: A GOP legislator has urged Merrick Garland to implement the 25th Amendment for Biden's removal from the presidency.

not_P.body:
Resolves YES if the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) do not invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and do not cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time).

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question.

question.title: [Metaculus] Will diplomatic expulsions or recalls take place between the Philippines and China before August 1, 2024?
question.body:
Will diplomatic expulsions or recalls take place between the Philippines and China before August 1, 2024?

Resolves the same as the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/24034/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question resolves as Yes if before August 1, 2024, one of these four events happens, according to official statements or credible reports:

The Philippines expels at least one diplomat representing the People's Republic of China (PRC).

The Philippines recalls at least one of its diplomats stationed in the PRC.

The PRC expels at least one diplomat representing the Philippines.

The PRC recalls at least one of its diplomats stationed in the Philippines.

If there are no such reports before that date, then this resolves as No.

Fine print and additional background information can be found on Metaculus.

Once the original resolves, its resolution will be applied to this market automatically. Trustworthy-ish users are encouraged to resolve this market before then if the outcome is known and unambiguous. Feel free to ping @jskf to request early resolution or to report issues.

Will there be no diplomatic expulsions or recalls between the Philippines and China prior to August 1, 2024?

This question resolves identically to the original on Metaculus.

(https://www.metaculus.com/questions/question_embed/24034/?theme=dark)Resolution criteria

This question will be answered with Yes if, before August 1, 2024, none of the following four occurrences take place, as per official announcements or credible sources:

The Philippines refrains from expelling any diplomat who represents the People's Republic of China (PRC).

The Philippines does not recall any of its diplomats who are in the PRC.

The PRC does not expel any diplomat who represents the Philippines.

The PRC does not recall any of its diplomats who are in the Philippines.

Should there be reports of such events before that date, this will be answered with No.

Further details and background information can be found on Metaculus.

question.title: Will OpenAI publicly commit to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle before July 1, 2024?
question.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if, before July 1, 2024, both of the following are true:

- OpenAI publicly commits to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle via a statement from the company or a company spokesperson, such as Sam Altman. The statement may be formal (such as a press release) or informal (such as a tweet or quote in an interview). The statement from OpenAI must indicate a new level of commitment to the principle in question, relative to the time the righttowarn.ai statement was published; it cannot be a reiteration that, for example, "we already have a culture of open criticism". 
- Metaculus verifies that the company has accepted the principle to the satisfaction of at least one member of righttowarn.ai. Metaculus may reach out to select signatories or endorsers to assess their level of satisfaction with OpenAI's commitment. Statements must be at least as rigorous as "this was a good first step" for this question to resolve as **Yes**.

not_P.title: Will OpenAI not publicly commit to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle before July 1, 2024?
not_P.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if, before July 1, 2024, at least one of the following is true:

- OpenAI does not publicly commit to the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle via a statement from the company or a company spokesperson, such as Sam Altman. The statement may be formal (such as a press release) or informal (such as a tweet or quote in an interview). The statement from OpenAI must indicate a lack of new commitment to the principle in question, relative to the time the righttowarn.ai statement was published; it cannot be a reiteration that, for example, "we already have a culture of open criticism". 
- Metaculus does not verify that the company has accepted the principle to the satisfaction of at least one member of righttowarn.ai. Metaculus may reach out to select signatories or endorsers to assess their level of dissatisfaction with OpenAI's commitment. Statements must be less rigorous than "this was a good first step" for this question to resolve as **Yes**.

para_P.body:
This inquiry will be marked as **Yes** if, before July 1, 2024, both of the following conditions are met:

- OpenAI officially endorses the "no retaliation for public risk disclosure" principle through a declaration from the organization or a representative, such as Sam Altman. The declaration may be formal (like a press release) or informal (such as a tweet or a quote in an interview). The communication from OpenAI must signify a heightened commitment to the principle in question compared to the period when the righttowarn.ai statement was released; it cannot merely restate that, for instance, "we already maintain a culture of open criticism".
- Metaculus confirms that the organization has embraced the principle to the satisfaction of at least one member of righttowarn.ai. Metaculus might contact select signatories or supporters to evaluate their level of contentment with OpenAI's commitment. Statements must be at least as stringent as "this was a good first step" for this inquiry to be marked as **Yes**.
